data.headline: Senior Backend Engineer
data.summary: Experienced backend engineer with a strong track record of delivering robust and scalable applications.

experience.title: Senior Backend Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented a scalable and highly available microservices architecture using Django and Docker.
Optimized database performance and implemented caching strategies to improve application responsiveness.
Led a team of junior engineers, providing mentorship and guidance to ensure successful project delivery.
Collaborated cross-functionally with product managers and front-end developers to enhance the overall user experience.

experience.title: Backend Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained a complex e-commerce platform using Django and MySQL.
Implemented secure payment processing and fraud detection mechanisms.
Automated deployment and infrastructure management using Docker and AWS.

projects.name: Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Developed a personalized recommendation engine for an e-commerce platform using machine learning algorithms.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Alejandro Martínez, a senior backend engineer, is shown in a formal suit against a plain background, with a neutral expression and good lighting.
